text: Luciana Pezzoni (born 1928) is an Italian gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around at the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Italian female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:People from Lodi, Lombardy
title: Luciana Pezzoni
